snippet.title: What have you always wondered about Adelaide?
snippet.content: Do you have a burning question about our city, its surrounds, its people or our culture? ABC Adelaide is proud to announce Curious Adelaide, a new project inviting you to have a say in the stories we cover. and we'll get a journalist to track down the answer. Each month, we'll take some of the best questions and give you the chance to vote on which one we should cover. We'll publish the answer on a Friday. If you're question gets a guernsey, you might even become part of the story telling process by joining a journalist on the road researching and interviewing the people who have the answers. It's journalism powered by the people. What are you curious about?
